pullRequest.title: [QueryContext] Refactor PlanMaker to use QueryContext
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Refactor PlanMaker to use QueryContext

Also addressed the TODO to directly use List instead of List for the instance level Plan
Modified and simplied tests to apply the interface change

beforeCommit.message:
[QueryContext] Refactor PlanMaker to use QueryContext

Also addressed the TODO to directly use List<IndexSegment> instead of List<SegmentDataManager> for the instance level Plan
Modified and simplied tests to apply the interface change

nodes.bodyText: This seems like refactoring to me which is not really needed to move to QueryContext? We can keep the interfaces same right?
